title: Mysterious Castle In The Carpathians, The 1981

sources.title: Mysterious Castle In The Carpathians, The 1981
sources.description: In the 1800s, a baron, who is the owner of a castle known as The Devil's Castle and who is also an obsessed opera fan, keeps the body of his favorite diva preserved in a crypt in the castle. In order to keep away potentially nosy visitors, the baron's mad-scientist assistant, invents all sorts of spooky phenomena in order to give the castle a creepy reputation. English subtitles makes this a bit easier to understand, but not much. Posted this one mainly for the absurdity.Â
